class.rdfs:comment: A patient is any person recipient of health care services.
class.rdfs:label: Patient

schema:diagnosis.rdfs:comment: One or more alternative conditions considered in the differential diagnosis process as output of a diagnosis process.
schema:diagnosis.rdfs:label: diagnosis

schema:drug.rdfs:comment: Specifying a drug or medicine used in a medication procedure.
schema:drug.rdfs:label: drug

schema:healthCondition.rdfs:comment: Specifying the health condition(s) of a patient, medical study, or other target audience.
schema:healthCondition.rdfs:label: healthCondition
